channel.title: CVE Feed for wpshuffle -- Frontend Post Submission Manager Lite – Frontend Posting WordPress Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for wpshuffle -- Frontend Post Submission Manager Lite – Frontend Posting WordPress Plugin

item.title: CVE-2024-8427|2024-09-06T06:50:54.701Z -- wpshuffle -- frontend%20post%20submission%20manager%20lite%20%E2%80%93%20frontend%20posting%20wordpress%20plugin
item.description: The Frontend Post Submission Manager Lite – Frontend Posting WordPress Plugin plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification of data due to a missing capability check on the save_global_settings and process_form_edit functions in all versions up to, and including, 1.2.2. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Subscriber-level access and above, to update the plugin's settings and forms.
